title.newValue: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Introducing the new post-delivery activities report

description.newValue:
The post-delivery activities report will display all the ZAP activities that occurred in your tenant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-defender-for-office/introducing-the-new-post-delivery-activities-report-in-microsoft/ba-p/3738768
GA date: March CY2023
